content:
Ok, here's an example of what $gds-color-purple-600 could be:

$gds-color-purple-600 = #35197F

To differentiate it from $gds-color-purple-500, we can either darken the color by adjusting the lightness or saturation or we can change the color a bit by adjusting the hue. You can use color adjusting tools such as color picker to generate the new value.

Please note that this is just an example, and the actual value may vary depending on the specific design system and branding guidelines.
